item.title: 将hugo生成的页面托管到github pages
item.description: GitHub User or Organization Pages Create a <YOUR-PROJECT> (e.g. blog) repository on GitHub. This repository will contain Hugo's content and other source files. Create a <USERNAME>.github.io GitHub repository. This is the repository that will contain the fully rendered version of your Hugo website. git clone <YOUR-PROJECT-URL> && cd <YOUR-PROJECT> Paste your existing Hugo project into a new local <YOUR-PROJECT> repository. Make sure your website works locally (hugo server or hugo server -t <YOURTHEME>) and open your browser to http://localhost:1313.
